Entry.String: {0} ~s~wants to share their position with you.
{0} ~s~vuole condidere la sua posizione con te.
{0} ~s~möchte seinen Standpunkt mit dir teilen.
{0} ~s~quiere compartir su posición contigo.
{0} ~s~chce udostępnić tobie swą pozycje.
~y~Warning! ~s~You just entered a ~g~gun-free zone~s~. Civilians can't use firearms here.
~y~Attenzione! ~s~Sei entrato in una ~g~zona senza armi~s~. I civili non possono usare le armi da fuoco qui.
~y~Achtung! ~s~Du hast gerade eine ~g~waffenfreie Zone~s~ betreten. Zivilisten können hier keine Waffen nutzen.
~y~¡Advertencia! ~s~Acabas de entrar en una ~g~zona libre de armas~s~. Los civiles no pueden usar armas de fuego aquí.
~y~Ostrzeżenie! ~s~Wszedłeś do ~g~strefy bez broni~s~. Cywile nie mogą używać tu broni.
You just left the ~g~gun-free zone~s~.
Sei appena uscito dalla ~g~zona senza armi~s~.
Du hast gerade die ~g~waffenfreie Zone~s~ verlassen.
Acabas de salir de la ~g~zona libre de armas~s~.
Opuściłeś ~g~strefę bez broni~s~.
Your voice chat is ~r~disabled~s~! You can enable it in the pause menu.
La tua chat vocale è ~r~disabilitata~s~! Puoi attivarla nel menu pausa.
Dein Sprachchat ist ~r~deaktiviert~s~! Du kannst es im Pausenmenü aktivieren.
¡Tu chat de voz está ~r~deshabilitado~s~! Puedes habilitarlo en el menú de pausa.
Twój czat głosowy jest ~g~wyłączony~s~! Możesz włączyć go w menu pauzy.
Your microphone is ~r~disabled~s~! You can enable it in the pause menu.
Il tuo microfono è ~r~disabilitato~s~! Puoi attivarlo nel menu pausa.
Dein Mikrofon ist ~r~deaktiviert~s~! Du kannst es im Pausenmenü aktivieren.
¡Tu micrófono está ~r~deshabilitado~s~! Puede habilitarlo en el menú de pausa.
Twój mikrofon jest ~g~wyłączony~s~! Możesz włączyć go w menu pauzy.
You are now connected to the ~p~voice server~s~.
Sei ora connesso al ~p~server vocale~s~.
Du bist nun mit dem ~p~Sprachserver~s~ verbunden.
Ahora estás conectado al ~p~servidor de voz~s~.
Jesteś połączony do ~p~serweru głosowego~s~.
You have been disconnected from the ~p~voice server~s~.
Sei stato sconnesso dal ~p~server vocale~s~.
Du wurdest vom ~p~Sprachserver~s~ getrennt.
Ha sido desconectado del ~p~servidor de voz~s~.
Jesteś odłączony od ~p~serweru głosowego~s~.
You can't ~r~fly airplanes ~s~at low altitude in this area.
Non puoi far ~r~volare gli aerei ~s~su basse altitudini in quest'area.
Du kannst in diesem Gebiet keine ~r~Flugzeuge~s~ in niedriger Höhe fliegen.
No se pueden ~r~volar aviones ~s~en baja altitud en esta zona.
Nie możesz ~r~latać samolotami ~s~tak nisko w tej strefie.
~y~Warning! ~s~You just entered the ~r~Cayo Perico Deathmatch Zone~s~. Civilians and criminals are allowed to kill anyone on sight here.
~y~Attenzione! ~s~Sei appena entrato nella ~r~Zona Deathmatch di Cayo Perico~s~. I civili e criminali qui sono autorizzati ad uccidere chiunque a vista.
~y~Achtung! ~s~Du hast gerade die ~r~Cayo Perico Deathmatch Zone~s~ betreten. Zivilisten und Kriminelle dürfen jeden bei Sichtkontakt töten.
~y~¡Advertencia! ~s~Acabas de entrar en la ~r~zona de combate a muerte de Cayo Perico~s~. Los civiles y los criminales pueden matar a cualquiera que vean aquí.
~y~Ostrzeżenie! ~s~Weszłeś do ~r~Strefy Deathmatchu Cayo Perico~s~. Cywile i kryminaliści mogą zabijać tu zabijać wszystkich.
~y~Warning! ~s~You just entered a ~r~redzone~s~. Civilians and criminals are allowed to kill anyone on sight here.
~y~Attenzione! ~s~Sei appena entrato in una ~r~zona rossa~s~. I civili e criminali qui sono autorizzati ad uccidere chiunque a vista.
~y~Achtung! ~s~Du hast gerade eine ~r~rote Zone~s~ betreten. Zivilisten und Kriminelle dürfen jeden bei Sichtkontakt töten.
~y~¡Advertencia! ~s~Acabas de entrar en una ~r~zona roja~s~. Los civiles y los criminales pueden matar a cualquiera que vean aquí.
~y~Ostrzeżenie! ~s~Weszłeś do ~r~strefy zagrożonej~s~. Cywile i kryminaliści mogą zabijać tu zabijać wszystkich.
Your ~g~report ~s~on ~r~{0} ~s~has been submitted.
La tua ~g~segnalazione ~s~su ~r~{0} ~s~è stata inviata.
Twoje ~g~zgłoszenie ~r~{0} ~s~zostało przyjęte.
~r~You cannot report the same player that soon.
~r~Non puoi segnalare lo stesso giocatore così presto.
~r~Nie możesz tak szybko zgłosić tego samego gracza.
~r~You cannot unlink all services. There must be at least one service linked.
~r~Non puoi scollegare tutti i servizi. Almeno un servizio deve restare collegato.
You ~g~successfully ~s~unlinked {0} from your account.
Hai scollegato con ~g~successo ~s~{0} dal tuo account.
You've ~g~successfully ~s~linked ~b~{0} ~s~to your account.
Hai collegato con ~g~successo ~b~{0} ~s~al tuo account.
~r~This email address is already linked to another account.
~r~Questo indirizzo email è già collegato ad un altro account.
~r~You must wait 2 minutes between email change attempts.
~r~Devi aspettare 2 minuti tra i tentativi di cambio dell'indirizzo email.
~r~{0} is not a valid email address.
~r~{0} non è un indirizzo email valido.
{0} account not found. Make sure your {0} desktop app is running, then restart FiveM and retry.
Account {0} non trovato. Assicurati che l'applicazione {0} sia in esecuzione sul desktop, poi riavvia FiveM e riprova.
{0} account not found. Disconnect and go back to the FiveM launcher, then log in to your FiveM account and retry.
Account {0} non trovato. Disconnettiti e torna al launcher di FiveM, poi effettua l'accesso al tuo account FiveM e riprova.
~r~The server is still processing your previous request. Please, wait before sending another one.
~r~Il server sta ancora elaborando la tua richiesta precedente. Per favore, attendi prima di inviarne un'altra.
~r~The entered password is too short (min 8 characters). Operation canceled.
~r~La password inserita è troppo corta (minimo 8 caratteri). Operazione annullata.
~r~The entered passwords don't match. Operation canceled.
~r~Le password inserite non corrispondono. Operazione annullata.
Your ~b~password ~s~has been ~g~successfully changed~s~.
La tua ~b~password ~s~è stata ~g~cambiata con successo~s~.
~r~You cannot do this while you're using a fake username.
~r~Non puoi fare questo mentre stai usando un nome utente falso.
You successfully activated your ~p~{0}~s~.
Hai attivato con successo il tuo ~p~{0}~s~.
~r~You already have an active subscription. If you need help, open a support ticket on our Discord.
~r~Hai già un abbonamento attivo. Se hai bisogno di aiuto, apri un support ticket sul nostro Discord.
~r~Unable to deactivate your current Silver Membership to upgrade. If the error persists, please open a support ticket on our Discord.
~r~Impossibile disattivare la tua attuale Silver Membership per l'aggiornamento. Se l'errore persiste, apri un support ticket sul nostro Discord.
Visit a ~r~hospital ~s~to get a ~p~plastic surgery~s~.
Visita un ~r~ospedale ~s~per effetuare una ~p~chirurgia plastica~s~.
~r~Operation canceled.
~r~Operazione annullata.
Go back to the ~b~Account ~s~menu to change your username.
Torna nel menu ~b~Account ~s~per cambiare il tuo nome utente.
This kind of item ~r~cannot be used~s~.
Questo tipo di oggetto ~r~non può essere utilizzato~s~.
You need to ~r~wait ~s~before changing your ~b~username ~s~again.
Devi ~r~aspettare ~s~prima di cambiare di nuovo il tuo ~b~nome utente~s~.
The name ~b~{0} ~s~is already taken.
Il nome ~b~{0} ~s~è già stato scelto.
~g~Staff members ~s~must contact an admin or manager for a ~b~name change~s~. The admin must make sure that the in-game name matches the name on {0} and is not obscene or vulgar.
~g~I membri dello staff ~s~devono contattare un admin o un manager per ~b~cambiare il nome~s~. L'admin deve assicurarsi che il nome in gioco corrisponda al nome su {0} e che non sia osceno o volgare.
~r~The code you entered is incorrect.
~r~Il codice che hai inserito non è corretto.
~r~The code has expired.
~r~Il codice è scaduto.
You successfully transferred {0} ~p~{1} ~s~to ~y~{2}~s~.
Hai trasferito con successo {0} ~p~{1} ~s~a ~y~{2}~s~.
~r~The server is unable to find the specified player.
~r~Il server non riesce a trovare il giocatore specificato.
~r~You can't send a gift to yourself.
~r~Non puoi inviare un regalo a te stesso.
You're ~r~too far ~s~from the player!
You are ~r~too far ~s~from the recipient.
You can only send ~r~{0} ~s~at a time.
You gave {0} ~r~{1}~s~.
You gave {0} ~r~{1}~s~.
The amount you entered is ~r~invalid~s~!
The recipient is ~r~no longer online~s~.
You don't have the ~r~required level ~s~to transfer money to other players.
You sent ~r~too much money~s~. Please, retry in ~r~another session~s~.
You are sending ~r~money too fast~s~. Please, ~r~wait ~s~before sending money again.
This player has received ~r~too much money~s~. Please, try again ~r~later~s~.
This player has ~r~recently ~s~received money. Please, try again ~r~later~s~.
~r~You don't have a vehicle with that license plate.
{0} ~s~has been officially ~r~recalled ~s~by GTA CnR. You can sell this vehicle for the ~g~FULL ~s~original price below.
~r~Unable to deliver a vehicle here! Please, move to another location.
Your ~b~{0} ~s~is on the way! Please, stay in the area.
~r~You can't get a vehicle delivered here!
~r~You can't get this vehicle delivered as a {0}!
~r~Your current vehicle is attached to a tow truck!
~r~You can't store your personal vehicle while you're inside it!
You have changed your ~b~job~s~. Your vehicle delivery has been ~r~canceled.
You ~r~left the area~s~. Your vehicle delivery has been ~r~canceled.
Your valet has been ~r~killed~s~. Your vehicle delivery has been ~r~canceled~s~.
~r~You're too far from any road. Your vehicle delivery has been canceled.
Your ~b~{0} ~s~has been returned to your garage!
~r~You can't do this when you are cuffed.
~r~You can't send your personal vehicle to maintenance when you're inside it!
Your ~b~{0} ~s~has been sent to maintenance. This will take a few minutes.
~r~This vehicle is already in maintenance!
The maintenance of your ~b~{0} ~s~has been completed.
Your ~b~{0} ~s~has been replaced and transported to your garage!
Your ~b~{0} ~s~has been replaced.
Your ~b~{0}~s~'s rental has been extended for another game week for ~g~{1}~s~!
Your ~b~{0}~s~'s rental has been terminated!
You sold your ~b~{0} ~s~to the server for ~g~{1}~s~.
Unable to download the ~y~vehicle model~s~. Retrying ({0})...
~r~Unable to load the vehicle model (0x5C-3). Please, try again later later.
~r~Unable to obtain vehicle network id (0x5C-4). Please, try again later later.
